instruction: Analyze the short- and medium-term targets for carbon footprints and green-revenue exposure set by Investor A and Investor B.
output: Upon analyzing the short- and medium-term targets, we found that Investor A has set a target of reducing their carbon footprint by 10% and achieving 10% exposure to green revenue by 2025. On the other hand, Investor B has set a more ambitious target of reducing their carbon footprint by 20% and achieving 20% exposure to green revenue by 2025. Both investors have recognized the importance of sustainability and are taking steps to align their investment strategies accordingly.
